text: Indian shares extended their gains for a third day led by banks as chances of an early U.S. Fed rate hike diminish. The BSE Sensex climbed 0.2 percent to 29,051, while the NSE Nifty advanced 0.2 percent as well to 8,960.Here are the stocks in focus for the day:
title: Stocks Radar: Jubilant Foodworks, Lupin, ONGC, Wipro and More
